about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a startup that offers modernity in job advertisement. Our goal is to promote the use of Bitcoin in the global job market.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.text: We are under construction, follow the development of the project on Github.

team.title: The Team
team.text: We form a decentralized team of maintainers with great skills.

support.title: Support the Project
support.text: Did you like BitVagas? Help us strengthen the project with your donation.

anderson.text: Responsive Design and Redesign Specialist. Passionate about open-source, visual design and cryptocurrencies.

cesar.text: Game Developer enthusiast, passionate about open-source Web Technologies, Cryptocurrencies and curious at Programming Languages Research.

randson.text: Passionate about technology and programming including Web Development, Open Source and Unix Systems.

rodrigo.subtitle: Advisor
rodrigo.text: C++, Python programmer and bitcoin enthusiast. A veteran of the financial sector, he worked as a software developer at the NYSE and BFM Bovespa.

privacy.description: Explore the Bitcoin universe and help stimulate the decentralized economy. Hire using digital coins.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Their pre registration information will not be used or reproduced in any way by our team, these being used only to contact via email, about BitVagas, such as opening of pre-release, newsletter, research, etc.
privacy.p2: These policies can and will be updated as the development of BitVagas to meet the platform's legal needs. When these changes occur, you will be notified via email of the changes.
